A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst movie of the year\, of the decade. Way to destroy a golden legendary franchise. Everything they did ruined everything they touched in this movie. I don't know how they could have done a worse job\, hurt and destroyed the characters and story more than they did. Everything they did\, EVERYTHING\, was wrong and bad for Star Wars. Everything! Use your brain and really look at what they did! Horrible.
